query.pigql: x = load "${App.Datasets.pipeline_trending_PartOne.Alias}";q = filter x by {{cell(timeperiod_list.selection, 0, "prior").asDateRange("date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')")}};q = filter q by date('ValidFromDate_Year', 'ValidFromDate_Month', 'ValidFromDate_Day') in [{{cell(timeperiod_list.selection, 0, "validfrom_date").asString()}}];q = filter q by date('ValidToDate_Year', 'ValidToDate_Month', 'ValidToDate_Day') in [{{cell(timeperiod_list.selection, 0, "validto_date").asString()}}];q = filter q by 'Stage.IsClosed' == "false";q = group q by all;q = foreach q generate sum('Amount') as 'sum_Amount';t = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_PartOne.Alias}";t = filter t by {{cell(timeperiod_list.selection, 0, "prior").asDateRange("date('CreatedDate_Year', 'CreatedDate_Month', 'CreatedDate_Day')")}};t = group t by all;t = foreach t generate sum('Amount') as 'sum_Amount';v = group q by all full, t by all;v = foreach v generate coalesce(sum(q.sum_Amount),0) as 'Open_Amount', coalesce(sum(t.sum_Amount),0) as 'Pipe_Generated';

q = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_PartOne.Alias}"; q = group q by all;q = foreach q generate coalesce(({{coalesce(column(kpi_current_pipeline.result,["sum_Amount"]),0).asObject()}} - {{coalesce(column(kpi_total_amount_last_year.result,["Open_Amount"]),0).asObject()}})/{{coalesce(column(kpi_total_amount_last_year.result,["Open_Amount"]),0).asObject()}},0)  as 'sum_percent'; q = foreach q generate 'sum_percent' as 'sum_percent', (case when 'sum_percent' < 0 then "#DC0029" when 'sum_percent' > 0 then "#26AB40" else "#7D98B3" end) as 'color';

q = load "${App.Datasets.quota_PartOne.Alias}"; q = filter q by {{cell(timeperiod_list.selection, 0, "current").asDateRange("date('StartDate_Year', 'StartDate_Month', 'StartDate_Day')")}}; r = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_PartOne.Alias}"; r = filter r by 'IsWon' == "true"; r = filter r by {{cell(timeperiod_list.selection, 0, "current").asDateRange("date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')")}}; s = group q by all, r by all; s = foreach s generate (sum(r.Amount)/sum(q.QuotaAmount))*100 as 'sum_QuotaAttainment';

q = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_PartOne.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "true"; q = filter q by {{column(Won_Lost_Toggle_1.selection, ["value"]).asEquality("IsWon")}}; q = filter q by {{cell(timeperiod_list.selection, 0, "current").asDateRange("date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')")}};  q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate avg('Amount') as 'avg_Amount';

q = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_PartOne.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'IsWon' == "true"; q1 = filter q by {{cell(timeperiod_list.selection, 0, "prior").asDateRange("date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')")}}; q2 = filter q by {{cell(timeperiod_list.selection, 0, "current").asDateRange("date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')")}}; co = group q1 by all, q2 by all; co = foreach co generate (sum(q2.'Amount')-sum(q1.'Amount'))/sum(q1.'Amount') as 'sum_percent'; co = foreach co generate 'sum_percent' as 'sum_percent', case when 'sum_percent' < 0 then "#DC0029" when 'sum_percent' > 0 then "#26AB40" else "#7D98B3" end as 'color';

q = load "${App.Datasets.quota_PartOne.Alias}"; q = filter q by {{cell(timeperiod_list.selection, 0, "current").asDateRange("date('StartDate_Year', 'StartDate_Month', 'StartDate_Day')")}}; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate coalesce(sum('QuotaAmount'),0) as 'sum_Amount', "Quota" as 'legend'; r = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_PartOne.Alias}"; r = filter r by 'IsWon' == "true"; r = filter r by {{cell(timeperiod_list.selection, 0, "current").asDateRange("date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')")}}; s = group r by all; s = foreach s generate coalesce(sum('Amount'), 0) as 'sum_Amount', "Won" as 'legend';  z = union  s,q;

query.formula: sum(A) over ([..0] partition by all order by ('CloseDate_Year~~~CloseDate_Week'))

query.pigql: a = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_PartOne.Alias}"; a = filter a by 'IsWon' == "true"; a = filter a by {{cell(timeperiod_list.selection, 0, "current").asDateRange("date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')")}}; b = load "${App.Datasets.quota_PartOne.Alias}"; b = filter b by {{cell(timeperiod_list.selection, 0, "current").asDateRange("date('StartDate_Year', 'StartDate_Month', 'StartDate_Day')")}}; c = group a by all full, b by all; c = foreach c generate sum(b['QuotaAmount']) as 'quota', coalesce(sum(a['Amount']),0) as 'amount'; c = foreach c generate (case when sum('quota') - sum('amount') > 0 then sum('quota') - sum('amount') else 0 end) as 'remaining_quota'; d = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_PartOne.Alias}"; d = filter d by 'IsClosed' == "false"; d = filter d by {{cell(timeperiod_list.selection, 0, "current").asDateRange("date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')")}}; e = group c by all full, d by all; e = foreach e generate coalesce(sum(d['Amount']),0) as 'amount', sum(c['remaining_quota']) as 'remaining_quota'; e = foreach e generate round(coalesce(sum('amount') / sum('remaining_quota'),0),1) as 'sum_pipe_coverage';e = foreach e generate 'sum_pipe_coverage' as 'sum_pipe_coverage', case when 'sum_pipe_coverage' < 1.0 then "#DC0029" else "#26AB40" end as 'color';

parameters.title: is your current pipeline for the period
